content: penis wine cosy free pattern by jacob stevne jørgensen @krejacob stevne when publishing your work please indicate the designer of the pattern you are not allowed to sell the pattern nor the finished product materials hook 5mm h tapestry needle stuffing for the balls yarn i used filcolana peruvian highland wool but you could use drops nepal or any yarn for hook 5mm as well color a the color of the shaft and balls ~55 g i used color 334 light blush color b the color of the tip <20 g i used color 361 madeira rose gauge 10 row of 16 double_crochet result in 10cm x 10cm abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch s stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease decrease by single crocheting 2 stitches together double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet blo double_crochet in the back loop only no of stitches at the end of the round * repeat section between two * until the end of the round pattern shaft with color a chain 5 and join to a circle with a slip_stitch round 1 chain 3 10 double_crochet in the circle join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 10 round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each s join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 20 round 3 chain 3 *1 double_crochet in next s 2 double_crochet in next s* join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 30 round 4 chain 3 *1dc in next s 2 double_crochet in next s 1 double_crochet in next s* join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 40 round 5 chain 3 double_crochet blo in each s join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 40 round 6-22 17 rounds ch3 double_crochet in each s join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain 40 fasten_off weave in end tip with color b chain 18 round 1 single_crochet in first chain form a circle increase single_crochet *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 round 2 *3 single_crochet increase* 30 round 3 *2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet* 36 round 4 *5 single_crochet increase * 42 round 5 *3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet* 48 round 6 *7 single_crochet increase* 54 round 7-12 6 rounds single_crochet in each s 54 we stop working in the round and start working back and forth to form the v-shape of the tip round 13 turn with a chain skip 1 s 53 single_crochet 53 round 14 turn with a chain skip 1 s 50 single_crochet decrease 51 round 15 turn with a chain skip 1 s 48 single_crochet decrease 49 round 16 turn with a chain skip 1 s 46 single_crochet decrease 47 fasten_off weave in end balls make 2 with color a round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase in each s 12 round 3 *single_crochet increase* 18 round 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 round 5 *3 single_crochet increase* 30 round 6 *2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet* 36 round 7 *5 single_crochet increase* repeat 42 round 8-11 4 rounds single_crochet in each s 42 round 12 *5 single_crochet decrease* 36
